newsitem.title: USA: GPU's Met-Ed tenders for preferred.
newsitem.headline: GPU's Met-Ed tenders for preferred.

text.p: Metropolitan Edison Co, a unit of GPU Inc, said Wednesday it is offering to purchase any and all of its:
(i) 117,729 outstanding shares of Cumulative Preferred Stock, 3.90% Series at $62.40 per share;
(ii) 33,249 outstanding shares of Cumulative Preferred Stock, 4.35% Series at $72.06 per share;
(iii) 29,175 outstanding shares of Cumulative Preferred Stock, 3.85% Series at $63.77 per share;
(iv) 18,122 outstanding shares of Cumulative Preferred Stock, 3.80% Series at $62.94 per share; and
(v) 35,637 outstanding shares of Cumulative Preferred Stock, 4.45% Series at $73.71 per share.
The January 1997 dividend for each series of preferred stock has been declared and is to be paid on January 1, record December 13, the utility said.
It said the offers are not conditioned on any minimum number of shares being tendered. The purchase offers and withdrawal rights are scheduled to expire at 2400 EST December 13/0500 GMT December 14.
